intro: Mentzelia nitens var. leptocaulis, commonly known as the slender-stemmed blazingstar, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States. It is characterized by its slender, often hairy stems and bright yellow flowers that bloom in late spring. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in arid environments.
